lexUnit.name: flog.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: beat with a whip or stick as a punishment.

sentence.text: ` I could have you flogged senseless for what you did , Sung .
I would have flogged myself to the death up to the end .
IRELAND 'S Patron Saint is ` being flogged to death " by councillors planning a St Patrick 's Heritage Centre in Downpatrick .
Eventually flogged into submission by the jockey , Bumboy set off after its vanishing playmates .

The Turks then flog them along the tourist drag between the Brandenburg Gate and what used to be Checkpoint Charlie .
Around A.D. 44 , Peter , then John , then all the others were arrested , flogged and ordered not to speak the name of Jesus .
A fire chief working in Saudi Arabia is to be publicly flogged for breaking the country 's alcohol laws .
I feel like flogging him but want him treated as well .
A notorious drinker and womaniser , he flogged his workers and extorted high taxes .
There is little evidence that the Romans used to flog their victims before crucifixion .
He began to flog Luke unmercifully , bringing the lash down across back , buttocks and legs again and again .
They hang the man and flog the woman
To be flogged like a dog !
The clerics had set Friday as the day for the full-scale punishment : burying Begum up to her waist in a public place where she would be flogged again and stoned .
Violators of the dress code can be publicly flogged , jailed , or fined .
Women 's rights activists say five women have been flogged publicly this year .

The case once again emphasizes the city-state 's uncompromising laws , which were highlighted when Fay was flogged last May for vandalism despite pleas for clemency , including one by President Clinton .
We 're repeatedly flogged over the head with the idea that Louis is a good father .
In 1969 , Eric James was flogged ten times with a cat-o-nine-tail after the courts rejected his appeal for clemency .
Last month , two Irish men were flogged in northwestern Pakistan after they were convicted on heroin smuggling charges .
Fay , now 19 , was flogged with a rattan cane four times in May for vandalizing cars in a spray-painting spree last winter .
The editor of an opposition newspaper was flogged for publishing an article alleging bad relations between a West African peacekeeping force and Liberia 's police .
